  <title>Quantum Council - Your Manifestation Guide</title>
  
  <style>
    * {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    :root {
      --primary: #4A90E2;
      --secondary: #9B59B6;
      --accent: #FFD700;
      --background: #0a0e27;
      --surface: #1a1f3a;
      --surface-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
      --text-primary: #ffffff;
      --text-secondary: #aaa;
      --border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
      --success: #4CAF50;
      --warning: #FF6B6B;
    }

    body {
      font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif;
      background: var(--background);
      color: var(--text-primary);
      min-height: 100vh;
      overflow-x: hidden;
      position: relative;
    }

    /* Enhanced quantum background */
    body::before {
      content: '';
      position: fixed;
      inset: 0;
      background:
        radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, rgba(74,144,226,0.15), transparent 60%),
        radial-gradient(circle at 80% 80%, rgba(155,89,182,0.18), transparent 55%);
      opacity: 0.9;
      z-index: -1;
    }

    /* Loading Screen */
    .loading-screen {
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      background: var(--background);
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      z-index: 9999;
      transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
    }

    .loading-screen.hide {
      opacity: 0;
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .logo-container {
      width: 80px;
      height: 80px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      position: relative;
    }

      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
